duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain compliance with U.S. employment laws and customs, as well as internal guidelines and policies.
Manage and coordinate time-sheet-related activities such as overtime, vacation requests, and holiday work requests.
Assist with health and group benefits for project site employees and dispatched employees relocating to the U.S.
Carry out day-to-day operations in all aspects of human resources including employee support and liaison for employee relations.
Assist in recruiting, coordination of interviews at site, and new hire onboarding.
Ensure a safe, secure, and well-maintained facility that meets environmental, health, and security standards.
Manage Contractor safety program, hazard control designs, methods, and procedures.
Instruct safety related classes and participate in daily, weekly or monthly Contractor and vendor meetings.
Ensure records are maintained in compliance with internal, local, state, provincial, and federal EHS laws, regulations, permits and program.
